articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: In depth with Windows 11 Recall—and what Microsoft has (and hasn’t) fixed - Ars Technica
articles.description: Original botched launch still haunts new version of data-scraping AI feature.

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Bluesky launches blue check verification - TechCrunch
articles.description: Bluesky announced on Monday that it is rolling out blue check verification, confirming previous rumors that this feature was on its way to the platform.
articles.content:
Bluesky announced on Monday that it is rolling out blue check verification, confirming previous rumors that this feature was on its way to the platform.
